r!{10.0%10.0?10.0}@{-10.0%10.0?10.0}#{-10.0%10.0?-10.0}${10.0%10.0?-10.0}&{0%0?255}~
r!{10.0%10.0?10.0}@{10.0%-10.0?10.0}#{10.0%-10.0?-10.0}${10.0%10.0?-10.0}&{255%0?0}~
r!{10.0%10.0?10.0}@{10.0%-10.0?10.0}#{-10.0%-10.0?10.0}${-10.0%10.0?10.0}&{0%255?0}~
r!{10.0%-10.0?10.0}@{-10.0%-10.0?10.0}#{-10.0%-10.0?-10.0}${10.0%-10.0?-10.0}&{100%0?100}~
r!{10.0%10.0?-10.0}@{10.0%-10.0?-10.0}#{-10.0%-10.0?-10.0}${-10.0%10.0?-10.0}&{255%100?0}~
r!{-10.0%10.0?10.0}@{-10.0%-10.0?10.0}#{-10.0%-10.0?-10.0}${-10.0%10.0?-10.0}&{255%255?0}~
